channel.title: Look how long my character was banned for
channel.description: Lmao, look at my lvl 24 acc who was perm banned for like 2,5 years, and got now unbanned. Look at the days lmao. [URL=http://img393.imageshack.us/my.php?image=omglolno0.png][IMG]http://img393.imageshack.us/img393/9030/omglolno0.th.png[/img][/URL]

item.title: Look how long my character was banned for
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“allserversuck, post:7, topic:68716”][quote author=Eh Pretty Easy link=topic=100697.msg1024612#msg1024612 date=1174252308]
Lmao, look at my lvl 24 acc who was perm banned for like 2,5 years, and got now unbanned. Look at the days lmao.

[/quote]holy jesus thats a freaking long time. jagex is so lazy lol. I appeal one of my accounts and it took a week for them to decide… but i got banned =(. and i thought a week was a long time.[/quote]
Well, Think how many people appeal to Stuff they Actually DID… This is sure to slow it down, And, would you feel like reading hundreds of appeals a day?

Read full topic
item.source: Look how long my character was banned for

item.title: Look how long my character was banned for
item.dc:creator: @bobby Bobby
item.description:
@bobby wrote:

[quote=“The Un-Named, post:6, topic:68716”][quote author=Hex Key link=topic=100697.msg1026965#msg1026965 date=1174284884]

I had an account scammed and banned for pass scamming and last logged in 550~ days ago.

Pass scamming??? tut tut un-named.
[/quote]

No, I tried selling it and it got scammed from me and the scammer’s tried pass scamming and their appeal was from like a 40yr old man typing like “The account in question was bla bla bla”, at the time I still typed like “oh hello how r u”.[/quote]

We all talked/talk like that.

Read full topic
